Once your account is deleted, all of its: Ni kete ti o ti paarẹ akọọlẹ rẹ, gbogbo awọn orisun rẹ ati data yoo tun paarẹ lailai. Jọwọ jẹrisi pe iwọ yoo fẹ lati paarẹ akọọlẹ rẹ patapata.
Ni kete ti akọọlẹ rẹ ba ti paarẹ, gbogbo awọn orisun rẹ ati data yoo paarẹ patapata. Jọwọ tẹ ọrọ igbaniwọle rẹ sii lati jẹrisi pe iwọ yoo fẹ lati pa akọọlẹ rẹ rẹ patapata.
or, enter the code manually: tabi, tẹ koodu sii pẹlu ọwọ
Please confirm access to your account by: Jọwọ jẹrisi iraye si akọọlẹ rẹ nipa titẹ ọkan ninu awọn koodu imularada pajawiri rẹ.

Recovery codes let you regain access if: Awọn koodu Ìgbàdọgbọn Jẹ ki o tun wọle si ti o ba padanu ẹrọ 2FA rẹ. Tọju wọn ni oluṣakoso ọrọ igbaniwọle to ni aabo.
This is a secure area of the application: Eyi jẹ agbegbe to ni aabo ti ohun elo. Jọwọ jẹrisi ọrọ igbaniwọle rẹ ṣaaju ki o tẹsiwaju.
To finish enabling two-factor authentica: Lati pari idinwo ijẹrisi meji-ifosiwer, ọlọjẹ koodu QR tabi tẹ bọtini iṣeto ni ohun elo ojulowo rẹ.
Two-factor authentication is now enabled: Ijeri ijẹrisi meji ni bayi ṣiṣẹ. Ṣe ọlọjẹ koodu QR tabi tẹ bọtini iṣeto ni app ojulowo rẹ.

When you enable two-factor authenticatio: Nigbati o ba mu ijẹrisi ijẹrisi meji ṣiṣẹ, iwọ yoo ti ṣetan fun PIN to ni aabo lakoko wiwọle. PIN yii le gba pada lati ohun elo atilẹyin to ṣẹṣẹ sori foonu rẹ.
With two-factor authentication enabled,: Pẹlu awọn iṣeduro ijẹrisi meji ti o ṣiṣẹ, iwọ yoo ṣetan fun PIN kan ti o ni aabo, PINE PIN lakoko wiwọle, eyiti o le gba pada kuro ninu ohun elo to atilẹyin topp lori foonu rẹ.
